title: Chipotle Stock Has Doubled This Year. New Products Could Mean More Gains.
text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill stock is rising on Monday, after BTIG raised its price target on the burrito chain, arguing that the shares have enough catalysts to make their valuation a nonissue, even after a nearly triple-digit run in 2019.

The back story. It’s been a good year for fast-food restaurant investors, but none of the sector’s shares have done as well as Chipotle stock (ticker: CMG), rising 95% year to date, while the S&P 500 is up less than 20% in that same time frame. The company has scored wins with its rollout...
description: BTIG analyst Peter Saleh reiterated Buy rating on Chipotle and boosted his price target to $890 from $845, citing his confidence that the company’s momentum can continue.
